install.name: JBolo!
install.author: TechJoomla
install.description: JBolo! is an extension that allows the users of your Joomla! site to chat with each other using a Gmail/FB Like chat interface. Please make sure to install the Plugin plg_sys_jbolo_asset and Module mod_jbolo. For docs/FAQs please visit the support section at Techjoomla.com

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__jbolo` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `from` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `to` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `message` text NOT NULL, `sent` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `recd` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__jbolo_group` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `chatroom_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `userid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `type` int(11) NOT NULL, `status` int(11) NOT NULL, `timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
